amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funding for the U.S. Board on Geographic Names.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harshbarger amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Harshbarger amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 389).
